title: Advanced autonomous orchestration features
description: Implement full autonomous workflow orchestration with validation, retry logic, worktree isolation, and periodic maintenance. This epic covers all features beyond the basic POC: validation engine with quality gates, infinite retry with corrective feedback, git worktree management, and periodic maintenance agents.

title: Add configurable maintenance cycle triggers
description: Implement configuration system for maintenance thresholds (items completed, LOC changed, time-based). Create config file structure (pokepoke.config.json) with validation. Add counters to track when maintenance should run.

title: Build validation engine with quality gates
description: Implement fast validation checks: tests, linting, type checking, git status clean, commits exist. Create validation hook system that can be configured via .github/hooks. Generate detailed validation results for corrective feedback.

title: Implement git worktree creation and management
description: Create worktrees for isolated task execution with pattern './worktrees/task-{id}'. Implement cleanup after successful merge. Ensure proper branch naming and isolation.

title: Build code cleanup agent
description: Create maintenance agent that scans recent git history for code smells, duplication, and improvement opportunities. Invoke Copilot CLI to refactor and clean up identified issues. Should commit with 'refactor:' prefix.

title: POC: Setup basic project structure
description: Initialize TypeScript/Node.js project with package.json, tsconfig.json, and basic directory structure (src/, tests/). Setup dependencies for spawning child processes and JSON parsing.
close_reason: Project structure initialized with TypeScript, Jest, ESLint configuration

title: Advanced autonomous orchestration features
description: Implement full autonomous workflow orchestration with validation, retry logic, worktree isolation, and periodic maintenance. This epic covers all features beyond the basic POC: validation engine with quality gates, infinite retry with corrective feedback, git worktree management, and periodic maintenance agents.

title: Implement merge and cleanup workflow
description: After validation passes, merge worktree changes to main branch, close beads item with 'bd close', cleanup worktree with 'git worktree remove'. Ensure proper error handling if merge conflicts occur.

title: POC: Query beads database for ready work item
description: Implement basic function to query 'bd ready --json' and parse the result to get the first available work item. This is the first step of the proof of concept.

title: Adapt pre-commit hooks for TypeScript/Node.js project
description: Pre-commit hooks were copied from ICM C# project but need significant modifications for PokePoke (TypeScript/Node.js). Update checks to use npm test, eslint, tsc for type checking. Remove C#-specific checks (dotnet build, MCP server health). Keep integrity verification and quality gate protection. Ensure hooks work with package.json structure and npm scripts.

title: Build discovery agent for issue creation
description: Create maintenance agent that scans codebase for TODO, FIXME, missing tests, and other issues. Automatically create beads items with 'bd create' for discovered work. Avoid duplicates by checking existing items first.

title: POC: Invoke GitHub Copilot CLI with work item
description: Implement function to invoke 'copilot -p' in programmatic mode with a basic prompt containing the beads work item details. Should pass work item title and description to Copilot CLI.

title: Build integration test runner agent
description: Create maintenance agent that runs full integration test suite. Invoke Copilot CLI to fix failing tests if detected. Runs on configurable schedule (every N items or M LOC changed).

title: POC: Report completion status
description: Implement simple reporting to stdout when Copilot CLI completes. Should log: work item ID, title, and completion status (success/failure). This completes the basic proof of concept.

title: Implement infinite retry loop with corrective feedback
description: Add retry logic that never gives up. Parse validation errors and construct specific corrective prompts for Copilot CLI. Include context about previous failures, what needs fixing, and guidance to resolve issues. Track retry attempts for logging.

title: POC: Query beads database for ready work item
description: Implement basic function to query 'bd ready --json' and parse the result to get the first available work item. This is the first step of the proof of concept.
close_reason: Beads query functions implemented and tested
